subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Probably from {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*s-taj||navel; abdomen; centre; self}} ({{zh-ref|Weidert, 1987}}; {{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). Cognate with {{cog|bo|ལྟེ||navel}}, {{cog|cdm|तोय्‌||navel}}.
